items.summary: Verify and fix the route registration for '/subject-to-career' in frontend/src/App.tsx so that the SubjectToCareer page component is correctly imported and rendered when navigating to that path, following the same pattern as other module routes such as '/career-path' and '/chatbot'.

Verify and fix the route registration for '/regional-language' in frontend/src/App.tsx so that the RegionalLanguage page component is correctly imported and rendered when navigating to that path, following the same pattern as other module routes.

Verify that frontend/src/pages/Modules.tsx passes the correct path props ('subject-to-career' and 'regional-language' respectively, prefixed with '/') to the ModuleCard components for 'Subject-to-Career AR Explorer' and 'Regional Language Career Platform', and fix any incorrect or missing path values.

Ensure frontend/src/pages/SubjectToCareer.tsx exists as a valid React component that exports a default component. If the file is missing or malformed, recreate it with a header, description explaining how subjects connect to career paths, and a 'coming soon' notice for AR features, styled consistently with the existing module pages.

Ensure frontend/src/pages/RegionalLanguage.tsx exists as a valid React component that exports a default component. If the file is missing or malformed, recreate it with a header, description explaining how the platform helps students explore careers in their regional language, and a 'coming soon' status indicator, styled consistently with SubjectToCareer.tsx.
